data.text: @mbismark The abject failure of leadership and what the govt values, over preceding years, and magnified during the pandemic has left healthcare workers under obscene load and the public frightened, confused and angry: causing each to magnify each other’s trauma during the pandemic.
@mbismark Bless - can’t wait for copy to arrive 👍🏻
@Rickstertez Chapter 12 on “Showing up all the cracks” is for you my friend! https://t.co/EiiC0kWUCR

@mbismark Think this sense of being stretched, depleted or at worse, broken - may have been building prior to pandemic. The cracks have just been torn open by the pandemic. Care happens in the small spaces & interactions between people. We have to get these right 🙏🏻 #bekind 🚑👩🏽‍⚕️👨🏼‍⚕️🏥❤️

@mbismark A few interesting stories about health care workers downplaying peoples jab reactions on this page. It quite sickening actually. 

Worth checking out if you have Instagram. https://t.co/TccWXku9MG
